Workflow.Name: DLP Request | Process Approved Policy Change
Workflow.Description: Automated flow, triggers when the Approval Status of a DLP Policy Change Request is updated to 'Approved' state. Calls a child flow to make the actual change on the Power Platform service (e.g., updates DLP policy), then updates the Dataverse request record to 'Fulfilled' state.

LocalizedName.description: DLP Request | Process Approved Policy Change

Description.description: Automated flow, triggers when the Approval Status of a DLP Policy Change Request is updated to 'Approved' state. Calls a child flow to make the actual change on the Power Platform service (e.g., updates DLP policy), then updates the Dataverse request record to 'Fulfilled' state.
